about_the_game:
Based on a true story.

Welcome to "My Days With Mia," an enthralling adult visual novel that invites you into the vibrant world of university life filled with friendship, drama, and intimate adventures. Set against the backdrop of a bustling college campus, you'll navigate the thrilling complexities of romance and the deep bonds of companionship.



Gameplay Features:

Deeply Interactive Storyline: Your choices shape your relationships and guide your story, leading to a romantic ending. Will you find true love or heartbreak?
Engaging Soundtrack: A carefully curated soundtrack enhances your journey through emotional highs and lows.
Full Voice Acting: Immerse yourself in the narrative with fully voiced characters, bringing each emotional twist and turn to life.
Stunning Artwork: Dive into beautifully illustrated scenes and character art that bring the world of college to life.
Dynamic Characters: Meet Mia, a spirited college classmate with a mysterious past. Get to know her deeply through thoughtful dialogue and shared experiences.
Adult Experiences: Explore mature themes with tastefully presented scenes. Experience the depth of adult relationships built on mutual respect and consent.
Engaging Soundtrack: A carefully curated soundtrack enhances your journey through emotional highs and lows.



Plot Introduction:

You are a college student who's recently transferred and are trying to navigate the new environment. Enter Mia, a charismatic classmate with an infectious smile and a knack for making you feel right at home. As you and Mia get closer, you're drawn into a world where every decision affects your shared future. Navigate through classes, coffee dates, and swimming sessions, and unfold a narrative that’s as compelling as it is rewarding.

Whether you're looking for a story rich with emotional depth or an exploration of meaningful relationships, "My Days With Mia" offers a unique blend of romance, realism, and adult themes. Prepare to immerse yourself in a college romance that will tug at your heartstrings and challenge you to think about what it really means to find love during the formative years of life.

Join us on this journey of love, learning, and the intricate dance of adult relationships. Experience college like never before, where every moment is a step towards your own unique love story.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is non-notarized. May not work with 10.15 Catalina

name: My Days With Mia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore 'My Days With Mia,' a visual novel of romance and choice in a vibrant college setting. Connect deeply with Mia through an interactive story, full voice acting, and rich artwork. Experience the thrill and intimacy of college love.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
